title: Are any Diana skins in the works, Riot?
body: Give us fans something to go on please. She hasn't had a skin in awhile and has so few compared to those like Annie and Lux. Please let us know.

replies.body:
HEy SnugglePuggle94,

Unfortunately, we don't discuss skins that may or may not be in the works, as timelines and concepts change. There have been instances where content has been shelved, or completely scrapped, and don't see PBE or the live client ever. (It's pretty rare, though.) 

That said, it'd be a pretty crappy feeling if I said, 'Yeah, we have x skin in the works!' and three months later you don't see the skin because we pushed it to a later date, or are changing the look/thematic. We don't want to get hopes up and keep promises we can't keep in terms of delivering a skin by x time, or promising x thematics. 

I've seen Blood Moon Diana requested a lot - do you have any other ideas?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=AEHQEFA1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-29T17:49:11.241+0000)
>
> HEy SnugglePuggle94,
> 
> Unfortunately, we don't discuss skins that may or may not be in the works, as timelines and concepts change. There have been instances where content has been shelved, or completely scrapped, and don't see PBE or the live client ever. (It's pretty rare, though.) 
> 
> That said, it'd be a pretty crappy feeling if I said, 'Yeah, we have x skin in the works!' and three months later you don't see the skin because we pushed it to a later date, or are changing the look/thematic. We don't want to get hopes up and keep promises we can't keep in terms of delivering a skin by x time, or promising x thematics. 
> 
> I've seen Blood Moon Diana requested a lot - do you have any other ideas?

YES! I do have a request! We need Harvest Moon Diana! Take a look!  http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/attachment.php?attachmentid=854014

Also a {{champion:131}}  skin with the same theme as the new {{champion:38}} skin would be awesome, 
Cosmic Reaver Diana.

Haha we just had a Blood Moon eclipse, need a Blood Moon Diana. 

As for others I can see a Haunted  /  Reaper / Underworld / shadow isles Diana or something, to be honest I'm a little surprised she doesn't have a Halloween specific skin yet.

But yeah Blood Moon Diana sounds the best to me.

There has been an Arclight and Exiled Diana that I have seen, both really cool.  Exiled: http://wall.anonforge.com/exiled-diana-sword-skin-art-league-of-legends/

Arclight: http://img.ifcdn.com/images/33b136985a61f7584827f1815956c2c3c32da0c5aad3c888bd94df04ac5b974d_1.jpg

I also saw a Medieval Diana somewhere, that looked really cool. 

I just wanted to know if you plan to give her another one. Sadly you can't tell me.
To be fair we did just have a super lunar eclipse so that makes sense
